DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to assess the impact of a decision aid leaflet on the participation of women invited to participate in the French national breast cancer screening program.
DOC.brief_title: Informed Decision Users of the Health System and Participation in Organized Screening for Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Women, aged between 50 and 74 years old living in 11 French departments
DOC.keyword: invited to national breast cancer screening
